name: Trapped with no ending v0.2
description:
Version 0.2 This is a huge improvement of the last version, graphics and AI is a bit improved and the level is longer.

I will keep release game updates like this so people can go back play different versions.

This game has no  story (YET). This is just a very early version, not a  finished game at all.

This will get updates and improved graphics and AI.

Many changes will come and this is just a bad version of the almost finished game.

The full game will be released here and on steam. This game may not look like much but i promise you that it's more to it than this!
